function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in productivity due to working with personal protective equipment and lengthening working hours to 12 hours","Impact":"Decreased productivity of labor","Mitigation":"Provide ergonomic and comfortable personal protective equipment, implement regular breaks and rotations for workers","Technologies":"Ergonomic PPE designs, automation for repetitive tasks","People":"Labor, construction workers","Owner":"Project management, site supervisors"},{"Description":"Escalation of cement and sand prices by 5% due to supply chain disruption and less availability","Impact":"Increased construction material costs","Mitigation":"Source alternative suppliers, negotiate bulk deals, use lean construction tools to optimize material usage","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, lean construction tools","People":"Procurement team, construction material suppliers","Owner":"Procurement team, project management"},{"Description":"Decreased space utilization and warehouse efficiency due to supply chain disruption and less availability","Impact":"Inefficient use of warehouse space","Mitigation":"Implement lean logistics practices, optimize warehouse layout and storage systems","Technologies":"Warehouse management systems, RFID tracking, lean logistics tools","People":"Logistics team, warehouse staff","Owner":"Logistics management, warehouse supervisors"}]}
